modName: Mercy is for the Weak - (deadly dragons and elemental dragons patch)
summary: Patches elemental dragons to receive the benefits of the deadly dragons mod
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img13.deviantart.net/0771/i/2015/002/b/0/alduin_attack_by_sa_chan1603-d8c9756.jpg[/img]

[size=6] [color=#ff0000][b] [center]Mercy Is For the Weak[/center]

[/b][/color][/size][color=#ffff00]Mercy is for the weak
(no NPC protection file)Â [/color]

This is a simple mod that patches together elemental dragons and deadly dragons, allowing all added dragons to benefit from deadly dragons boosted stats and joining the leveled lists of both mods

(Experimental version for those expiriencing problems with NPC not taking damage)

[color=#ffff00]Greater Alduin series[/color]

Load in this order:
Violent Alduin (version).esp
World Eater beater.esp
Greater Alduin(version).esp

This series of patches revamps the alduin boss fight by giving the alduin from world eater beater with the powers of the violent alduin series. they are as follows:

[color=#ffff00]Greater Alduin: Novice
(Requires world eater beater and violent alduin easy)
[/color]
The weakest version of the series. Make no mistake, If you underestimate this world eater he'll be mounting your head in his trophy room before you can say "Holy sh-"

[color=#ffff00]Greater Alduin: Warrior
(Requires world eater beater and violent alduin normal)[/color]

This is the mode for those who wish to test their skills. You will be challenged, but the strong-willed will survive.

[color=#ffff00]Greater Alduin: Hero
(requires world eater beater and violent alduin hard)

[/color]Behold, Alduin, bane of our ancestors and slayer of the righteous. Only those who are truly strong may even attempt this difficulty. For the foolish, Know that your weakness will be punished.


[color=#ffff00]Greater Alduin: Legend[/color]
[color=#ffff00](requires world eater beater and violent alduin legendary)[/color]

Turn back all fools seeking glory, for you stand before the World Eater in all his terrible glory. The dragon that stands at the end of time and all things waits just beyond this door, all who enter will know his wrath.
author: LEGENDSOFMAGNUS7

files.name: Mercy is for the weak (No NPC Protection)
